title: Microsoft Anti-Trust Showdown
content:
On Monday, 17th September 2007, "at high noon", watch the final anti-trust 500 million fine "showdown" decision:

The two opponents in this "shootout" are

1. **Neelie Kroes** , see photo here:

[http://ec.europa.eu/commission\_barroso/kroes/index\_en.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105439/http:/ec.europa.eu/commission_barroso/kroes/index_en.html "http://ec.europa.eu/commission\_barroso/kroes/index\_en.html")

2. **Steve Ballmer** , see photo here:

[http://www.microsoft.com/Presspass/exec/steve/default.mspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105439/http:/www.microsoft.com/Presspass/exec/steve/default.mspx "http://www.microsoft.com/Presspass/exec/steve/default.mspx")

Who will shoot faster at high noon on Monday?

Who will be the first to release the trigger?

Don't forget to bet at your favorite betting office.

Have fun :-)

**† † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † †  
Breaking news (17 Sep 07) ...  
† † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † †**

The shootout is over:

Guess who had to bite the dust.

† † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † †
author: Uli
